synopsis.text: In futuristic Tokyo, a group of humans with awakened supernatural powers called "Attractors" find themselves being hunted by Kestos, a secret organization. Led by an idealistic teenager named Quon, these Attractors band together to defend themselves against this threat. Quon is driven by the traumatic memory of failing to save his village from destruction in the past. When two Attractors named Tei and Towa are captured by Kestos, Quon spearheads a daring rescue mission by infiltrating the organization's headquarters using stolen blueprints. However, facing extreme danger awaits them inside. United by Quon's determined leadership and their shared status as Attractors, this unlikely group fights to protect their kind from sinister forces that seek to exploit their powers. Their struggle for survival in this high-tech landscape shapes the core narrative of the story.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
